caption: Cyberpunk 2077- it only took 3 years after release for it to be playable.
Dragon Age- with great power comes great lankiness.
The Witcher(all)- couldn't not be here, my polish origin made me do this.
Valorant- this isn't a good game. Nor am I good at this game.
Baldur's Gate 3- you can turn into cheese and fight your opponents with cheesy fumes. 10/10.
Genshin Impact- it's a gacha game. I lost all my money.
Honkai Star Rail- another gacha game. But I remained strong, haven't gambled yet.
Soma- genuinely a great game. Fans of 'I have no mouth, and I must scream' will love this.
Doom Eternal- best soundtrack to listen to before a job interview.
